main.name: Shrey Vakil
main.occupation: 4th year Student studying Computer Science @ UofT
main.description: Currently interning at Dayforce Ceridian as a Software Developer
main.bio: I am a 4th year Computer Science and Mathematics student at University of Toronto, who loves working on web apps and has keen interest in the field of information security. In my free time, I love to work on CTFs and play Valorant ;)
main.contactmessage: Wanna queue up, work on projects or just get in touch. Write me here!

resume.skillmessage: Here are some technologies that I love to use...

education.degree: Bachelor's of Science -- Computer Science Specialist

work.title: Software Developer - Intern
work.description:
Developed 3 of internal tools used by the QA team to test APIs and perform regression by comparing more than 1000 files each with more than 50,000 lines.
 Wrote automation test cases using the fitnesse framework.

work.title: Teaching Assistant
work.description:
Conducted Tutorials for students to understand lecture concepts and clear any doubts. Marked assignments, problem sets and tests. Developed assignments and helped professors identify potential problems and solutions to the same. 
Courses:  Systems Programming, Theory of Computation, Computery Security

work.title: Programs and Initiatives Coordinator
work.description: Worked with the Robert Gillespie Academic Skills Centre (RGASC). Planned and Organized Workshops, conducted surveys to determine the effectiveness of the conducted workshops. Tabled and reached out to students to make them aware of the support provided by the RGASC
